1.11.2.0.3.0:
Added dimension load count tracking
Added new dimension loading command variants, to run command on a specific load count, or on a multiple of some load count
1.11.2.0.2.1: Fix non-dimension-specific dimension loading commands not working
1.11.2.0.2.0:
Added the options to run commands on every world load or on every dimension load
Added toggle options to disable the commands without having to remove all of them
1.11.2.0.1.0: Initial release - can run a set of commands on initial world creation
